title: Paperless-ngx
description: Paperless-ngx is a document management system that transforms your physical documents into a searchable online archive.

env.name: PAPERLESS_TIME_ZONE
env.label: Timezone
env.description: The timezone for the Paperless-ngx instance

env.name: DB_USER
env.label: Database User
env.description: The username for the Paperless-ngx database (cannot change value)

env.name: DB_PASSWORD
env.label: Database Password
env.description: The password for the Paperless-ngx database (cannot change value)

env.name: DB_NAME
env.label: Database Name
env.description: The name of the Paperless-ngx database (cannot change value)
